data.title: guided bike tour: EXPLORE LITHUANIA and DZŪKIJA NATIONAL PARK – bikeBaltic
data.text:
This is a 7-day self-guided bike tour to Dzūkija. The total distance by bike is 370 km. The route includes non-busy roads, bicycle roads, paved roads, forest paths, and gravel paths.

Plan of the trip:

On the 1st day, you will arrive in Vilnius and stay overnight.

On the 2nd day, you will explore Vilnius region (distance by bike – 50 km.).

On the 3rd day, you will jump to the train and go to Trakai, from there ride to Užutrakis, Senieji Trakai and at the end of the day take the train to Varėna (distance by bike – 90 km.).

On the 4th day you will take a long ride: Varėna – Merkinė – Meteliai – Birštonas (distance by bike – 100 km.).

On the 5th day, you will ride from Birštonas to Kaunas, then to Pažaislis monastery and back to Kaunas where you will stay overnight (distance by bike – 90 km.).

On the 6th day, you will leave Kaunas to go to Kačerginė, Zapyškis. Then, you will take the ferry to Kulautuva and ride back to Kaunas. The train will take you from Kaunas to Vilnius (distance by bike – 40 km.).

On the 7th day – a departure from Vilnius.

Dzūkija National Park – pine forests, inland dunes, swamps, and rivers that reign in the country’s largest national park harbor is a unique natural world, giving shelter to numerous rare plants and animals.

Deep dive into Dzūkija National Park by bike. The self-drive tour itinerary is combined with using trains and bikes which makes your trip friendly to our lovely nature. In this route, you will explore Dzukija National Park including authentic villages, main cities of the region, and different kinds of natural pearls from the rivers to lakes and forests. The tour is combined of the most popular Dzukija National Park sites together with undiscovered unique spots. Together with Dzukija National Park, you will visit the capital of Lithuania- Vilnius, and Trakai- the ancient capital of the country.

Price: from 115 EUR per person.

The package includes train and ferry tickets, 7-day rent of the bike equipped with helmet and locker, maps, additional information about the region, and the most interesting places in the area.

We can also provide accommodation for an additional price.
